title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama comparable to ChatGPT interface; chat history, multi-user, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with tab completion, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat inside the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting synchronous, reactive, and streaming APIs; Kotlin friendly.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template combining Ollama LLM with Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, Next.js chat, function-calling, fine-tune LoRA, and more.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library for Ollama with async/await, streams, and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama service plus GPU sidecars for reproducible CI pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with .NET 6+ support, IAsyncEnumerable streaming, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models to servers with slash commands and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using local Ollama models; supports custom prompts.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama server pre-installed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama HTTP API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package wrapping Ollama REST API for macOS/iOS apps with SwiftUI example.
